title: Trucking
description: Have you ever thought about the different kinds of trucks and what they do? Trucking gives students information about different types of trucks and the kinds of jobs they do. Photographs of trucks doing their jobs support the text. Repetitive text and high-frequency words also support early readers.
meta: delivery, garbage, heavy, special, tow, truck
Use the reading strategy of connecting to prior knowledge to understand text
Consonant Blends : Identify and use consonant blend tr
Plural Nouns : Identify and understand the use of plural nouns
Alphabetizing : Identify and understand how to place words in alphabetical order

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
